Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Directs the commissioner of housing and community renewal to require certain housing quality standards inspections of Section 8 housing
Summary: Directs the commissioner of housing and community renewal to require housing quality standards inspections of Section 8 housing when a tenant moves out or vacates.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of housing and community renewal to require certain housing quality standards inspections of Section 8 housing
